One day, after living the mediocre life of a side character while undergoing frenzied training by night, he reincarnates in a different world and gains ultimate power. The young man who is only playing at being a secretive powerhouse, his misunderstanding subordinates, and a struggling, giant, shadowy organization…

Title: Wizard Stone

Title: Carefree Scholar
Description: The story is about Li Yi, an engineer from 21st century. He was killed by a fire in a library and reincarnated into the body of a poor but handsome scholar in ancient times. And luckily he seems to carry along all the books in that burned library in his head.

However, she suddenly found herself in a showbiz novel, where she became a scapegoat for all sorts of scandals, a third rate celebrity, leading to her contract being terminated by her agency.

Charles Bernard, an unrecognized grandson of a wealthy industrialist, refuses to accept his fate as cannon fodder in a war that will consume millions. Instead, he bets everything on a radical idea—transforming tractors into weapons of war.

As he faces the harsh reality of financial troubles, his life takes an unexpected turn when he’s unwillingly thrust into the role of someone’s rutting partner.

I became a maid in a horror game.
